segments.original_transcript: Hello. Thank you for calling RTC. My name is Vikram. How may I help you today? Hello. Hello. Which language are you comfortable, sir? Tamil language wanted. Okay. summary: Vikram, an employee at RTC, is assisting a caller who requires assistance in Tamil. As Vikram himself does not speak the language, he attempts to transfer the caller to another representative who can assist with Tamil-language queries. The caller is put on hold while Vikram checks with a fellow agent, and the call is eventually transferred.
cohere_points:
- Vikram is handling an inbound call to RTC
- Customer wants to speak in Tamil
- Call is transferred 
- Gratitude and thank you repeated multiple times through the call 

Let me know if I can help with anything else!
